title: Implement WebGL extension OES_vertex_array_object
body: The WebGL extension OES_vertex_array_object was ratified by the Khronos Board of Promoters may 2013 and may be implemented. https://www.khronos.org/registry/webgl/extensions/OES_vertex_array_object/

comments.body: Feedback has been ignored since June 2015. Issue link: https://developer.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-edge/platform/issues/new/
